text: Koerner, Ray & Glover is an American blues band formed in 1962. ==Discography== ;Studio albums * Blues, Rags and Hollers (1963) * Lots More Blues, Rags and Hollers (1964) * The Return of Koerner, Ray & Glover (1965) ==References== Category:Blues bands Category:Musical groups established in 1962 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2002 Category:Elektra Records artists
title: Koerner, Ray & Glover
